name: METAPIZZA DELIVERY
description:
Please play in full screen!

CONTROLS:

  • W: Move up
  • A: Move left
  • S: Move down
  • D: Move right
  • Right Mouse Button: Grappling hook (hold to swing, release to launch yourself)
  • Left Mouse Button: Throw pizza (hold to aim, release to throw)
  • Spacebar: Grab pizza from the pizza stand

Go to any of the pizza icons and press Spacebar to collect up to 10 pizzas for delivery, then follow the green circle markers to find hungry clients. Using the left mouse button to aim and throw, feeding the hungry human. Once your shift is over, finish any remaining deliveries and return to a pizza icon to receive your pay - try to aim for the highest wage possible!

In-between shifts the pizza bot can enjoy his free time by exploring, jumping, and swinging around the cityscape while relaxing to chill tunes.

Credits:
Jacob Lyons: Code/Environmental Art
Jesse Worden: Sound/Music
Kyle Beck: Code
Kyle Lehman: Design
Robert Eastlick: Character Art
